catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 647
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: shallow dish on low foot; design of three blue cylindrical baskets with open weave, filled with robust red cherry blossoms; stylized waves at bottom; blue flowers with vines on underside and vertical painted ridges on foot
medium: Nabeshima ware; porcelain with underglze blue and overglaze enamels
title: Plate with baskets and cherry blossoms
